text: Cerro Agassiz is a mountain in the mountain range of the Andes, located in the border between Argentina and Chile, in the region of Patagonia.http://www.peakbagger.com/peak.aspx?pid=8650 ==References== Agassiz Agassiz Category:Mountains of Magallanes Region Category:Landforms of Santa Cruz Province, Argentina Category:Argentina–Chile border Agassiz
title: Cerro Agassiz
